issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

-

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

`https://www.pcgamingwiki.com/wiki/Grand_Theft_Auto_V`

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard URL Tracking filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

Some links in the `Availability` section have tracking parameters:
`https://www.pcgamingwiki.com/wiki/Grand_Theft_Auto_V#Availability`

```adb
! https://epicgames.com/p/grand-theft-auto-v?epic_affiliate=pcgamingwiki
! https://gamersgate.com/product/grand-theft-auto-v-premium-edition?caff=5418682
! https://humblebundle.com/store/grand-theft-auto-v-premium-edition?partner=pcgw
||epicgames.com^$removeparam=epic_affiliate
||gamersgate.com^$removeparam=caff
||humblebundle.com^$removeparam=partner
```

The list already contains some filters for `humblebundle.com`.


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body: @MasterKia That parameters on this site used for marketing - when someone buys using that links, he get a percent of the finished order.

issue.title: Google Feed Missed ads
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

4.0.910

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

Google Feed on far left screen

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Cookie Notices filter, AdGuard Popups filter, AdGuard Mobile App Banners filter, AdGuard Widgets filter, AdGuard Other Annoyances filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. If I refresh filters and then refresh my Google feed it will get most ads, but some game ads still show up.  There needs to be both an increase in refreshing filters and a way to not miss some of those ads. 

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

-

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

`https://www.pcgamingwiki.com/wiki/Grand_Theft_Auto_V`

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard URL Tracking filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

Some links in the `Availability` section have tracking parameters:
`https://www.pcgamingwiki.com/wiki/Grand_Theft_Auto_V#Availability`

```adb
! https://epicgames.com/p/grand-theft-auto-v?epic_affiliate=pcgamingwiki
! https://gamersgate.com/product/grand-theft-auto-v-premium-edition?caff=5418682
! https://humblebundle.com/store/grand-theft-auto-v-premium-edition?partner=pcgw
||epicgames.com^$removeparam=epic_affiliate
||gamersgate.com^$removeparam=caff
||humblebundle.com^$removeparam=partner
```

The list already contains some filters for `humblebundle.com`.


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
> double standard

Why? Removing of that parameters does not break links to discounts as I know.

issue.title: www.msn.com

comment.body:
> Возможно, AdGuard ошибочно относит данную информацию к рекламе. Однако, на самом деле, когда пользователь самостоятельно переходит в карточку организации, это говорит о том, что ему нужна информация об этой организации. В карточке можно найти различные данные, такие как услуги, акции и другую информацию. Как пользователю, мне важна эта информация, именно то, что AdGuard скрывает, я и хочу увидеть.

От обычой рекламы не отличить. Добавьте в пользовательский фильтр:
```adblock
yandex.ru#@#._advert
yandex.ru#@#.card-header-media-view__list > div.card-header-media-view__advert-wrap
yandex.ru#@?#.business-card-view__overview > div.business-card-view__section > div.business-card-view__offers:upward(1)
```

Однако, на самом деле, когда пользователь самостоятельно переходит в карточку организации, это говорит о том, что ему нужна информация об этой организации. В карточке можно найти различные данные, такие как услуги, акции и другую информацию. Как пользователю, мне важна эта информация, именно то, что AdGuard скрывает, я и хочу увидеть. ### Screenshots

comment.body:
It's caused by `Web Annoyances Ultralist`, so please disable that filter list or add this rule:
```adblock
bing.com#@$##b_tq_header, .header, .sbox { position: absolute !important; }
```
to the use rules.

comment.body:
丁寧のお調べいただきありがとうございます。おっしゃる通り、「サードパーティのAuthorizationヘッダをブロックする」で再現いたしました。また、「IPアドレスを秘匿」により地域制限も発動したため、それぞれに対し、最小限の例外を追加いたしました。

> ・VPNについて

誤解をしてしまい失礼いたしました。ただ、これについては現実的な解決策がサーバーの追加しかなく、技術というより需要と財政の問題になってくると思います。

issue.title: Block Twitter hijacker
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension

### AdGuard version

4.1.56

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Dangerous site

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

http://shindaan.com/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard Japanese filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. According to `https://twitter.com/yuusultultu/status/1668185343907237888` the site is trying to hijack Twitter account of user who allowed account access. Please check it. The site is shown only on mobile UA.

2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![shindaan](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/58900598/03747e41-94c9-4c89-a84c-b74d0bf8435f)

</details>

issue.body:
### ATTENTION

This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you're using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you're using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)
